author: Pamela Muse
text:
Ashland, OR is interested in re-vamping their employee performance evaluation process.  They are looking for an easier tool for our supervisors to use in conducting performance evaluations.  For example, a fillable PDF that prompts them through the evaluation.  
They would like one evaluation template for general service employees and a separate more in-depth form for evaluating managers.  Please forward your documents or links to:
Tina Gray
grayt@ashland.or.us 
Thank you!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Employee Evaluations
